name: Anno 1404
notes:
Game Crashes on Startup when not using dx9, see:
https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=33234#notes

After above workaround Game just shows Blackscreen:
https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/641

files.installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Anno 1404 Gold Edition/Addon.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
wine:
  esync: true
  version: tkg-protonified-4.1-x86_64
